page.title: 11A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ALISON
page.content: Today I woke up at 7.00am and lay in bed until 7.30am.I dressed into my school uniform and washed myself in the bathroom.I made my bed.For breakfast I had a bowl of cornflakes.At 8.10am I did some housework.At 8.40 we got in the car to go to school.At school,when the bell rang I went into the classroom to read my book.We are practising our play for the end of term.We went into the hall to look at the exhibition of work then we went swimming.After swimming we lined up for lunch.We played on the climbing frame at lunchtime and we did needlework after lunch until hometime. I went to the swimming gala practise then I went home and watched The Champions on the television.I then played tennis on the wall and at 8.30pm I went to bed.
